headline: Microchip Technology Unveils 32-bit MCU Family with Integrated High-Performance Analog Peripherals
summary: PIC32A MCU family showcases industry-leading analog peripherals with 200 MHz CPU for cost-effective system-level solutionsCHANDLER, Ariz., March 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- To address the increasing demand for high-performance, math-intensive applications in a wide range of industries, Microchip Technology (Nasdaq: MCHP) has released the PIC32A family of MCUs. Enhancing the company’s already robust 32-bit MCU portfolio, PIC32A MCUs are designed to be cost-efficient, high-performance solutions f
